data.title: Numbers of Combat Soldiers and Casualty Data: Media Kit: About: Bureau of Maine Veterans' Services
data.text:
Mainers At War - Numbers of Combat Soldiers and Casualty Data

The following is a list of statistical data on the number of Mainers that have served during the various wars. These lists are available in Adobe and Excel formats. If you don't have one of these programs installed, you may download the Adobe Reader or Excel Viewer by clicking the appropriate link, however, make sure to review the system requirements prior to downloading. If you are not able to download these and would like to request a copy be mailed to you, please email: mainebvs@maine.gov

Casualty listings for servicemembers from Maine are available on the website of the National Archives and Records Administration (NARA). The following are the links for accessing the listings for WWII, Korea and Vietnam.

World War II Honor List of Dead and Missing Army and Army Air Force Personnel from Maine

State Summry of War Casualties from World War II for Navy, Marines Corps, and Coast Guard Personnel from Maine

State Level Lists of Casualties from the Korean War and Vietnam Conflict

Defense POW/MIA Accounting Agency

Information and data pertaining to Missing Personnel and Recovery Operations is available on the website of the Department of Defense Prisoner of War / Missing Personnel Office (DPMO). The following is a link to their website: DPMO Website
